function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large-scale population surveillance may lead to privacy concerns and data misuse.","Impact":"Loss of public trust and legal implications for privacy violations.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection policies and anonymize data effectively.","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization techniques, and secure data storage systems.","People":"General public, data protection agencies, legal authorities.","Owner":"Surveillance organizations, data protection agencies."},{"Description":"Reliance on wastewater surveillance may lead to complacency in individual testing and personal hygiene.","Impact":"Underreporting of infections, delayed response to outbreaks, and increased transmission due to reduced personal hygiene measures.","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, continued emphasis on individual testing, and proactive communication of surveillance findings.","Technologies":"Public health communication channels, targeted messaging platforms, and community engagement tools.","People":"General public, public health authorities, community leaders.","Owner":"Public health authorities, community leaders."},{"Description":"Inability to identify specific infected individuals and locations may result in ineffective contact tracing and targeted containment measures.","Impact":"Difficulty in implementing targeted quarantines, contact tracing, and isolation measures, leading to increased transmission within communities.","Mitigation":"Integration of wastewater data with individual testing results, enhancement of contact tracing strategies, and localized outbreak response planning.","Technologies":"Data integration platforms, contact tracing apps, and geospatial analysis tools.","People":"Public health authorities, local government officials, healthcare workers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government officials."}]}
